review_blob: This is terrific beer.  Im surprised it isnt rated higher.  Good sturdy head.  Nice and malty initially and then a pleasant hoppy finish.  Good balance between the sweet malt and bitter hops.  Going to try this with a NY strip steak next time.  Im thinking this will be an excellent pairing.
Bottle.  NIce amber color.  Very pleasant aroma, hint of apple.  Nice flavor, well balanced.  Highly recommended.
